channel.title: CVE Feed for OpenText -- NetIQ Identity Console
channel.description: The latest CVEs for OpenText -- NetIQ Identity Console

item.title: CVE-2023-7240|2024-06-04T17:17:29.988Z -- opentext -- netiq%20identity%20console
item.description: Â An improper authorization level has been detected in the login panel. It may lead to unauthenticated Server Side Request Forgery and allows to perform open services enumeration. Server makes query to provided server (Server IP/DNS field) and is triggering connection to arbitrary address.
